author: brandiskip
body:
#### PR description:

Histograms added for stub coordinates  and z, stub bend, and stub efficiency vs tp pT
[Proposal for validation plots](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1242120/contributions/5230280/attachments/2579402/4449460/DQM_Tracker.pdf)
[Presentation slides with final results](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1414546/contributions/5965160/attachments/2861743/5006999/DQM_Update_OfflineSW.pdf)

#### PR validation:

Added histograms examined and validated, showing sensible results as presented at the offline software meeting

title: Outer Tracker Phase2 DQM: additional stub validation plots
